TopicTitle: Mod, Vehicle, or Plugin Advertisements! (On Hold due to being grounded again)

Articles.Content:
Ok, i had this idea that i should practice a bit with my screen recording before i start my space shuttle history series. As such, i decided that i would make advertisements for people's works on request basis. How i work is as follows:

A user needs to contact me, preferably via this thread, with a request for an advertisement, what work, link to their work, and how long they want the advertisement to be.

I will do my best to get to everyone as best i can but order will be on a first come first served basis.

An example of my work is coming.

WIP

Mike-NZ and Tristonwilson12: X-37

Avera9eJoe: WindowShine

Tristonwilson12: Pegasus

SAP-C Company

Mad Rocket Scientist. SpaceShipOne & White Knight

pandora's kitten. Kolonial house

Work officially begins when I get home from school

Edited October 13, 2015 by Sampa
All i can say for the time being (early stages as i gathered necessary resources to do so) X-37

Dude! I would be honored if you took WindowShine for a short spin. I'd put it on the thread's front page if you want too. The video doesn't need to be long, just as long as is easy for you. Here's the thread.

Dude! I would be honored if you took WindowShine for a short spin. I'd put it on the thread's front page if you want too. The video doesn't need to be long, just as long as is easy for you. Here's the thread.

Sure thing! I'll add you to the OP as a WIP

Sure thing! I'll add you to the OP as a WIP

would you like to take run with Pegasus in a bit?

Edited August 31, 2015 by Tristonwilson12
Very cool! If I noticed correctly, there is another aircraft that this will be launched from?

Sampa, do you accept advertisments for companies? Becasue if so, SAP-C would love to have one done! Heres a link to our work http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/130374-SSI-ASAIB-PB-Conglomerate-Looking-for-anyone-to-join!-*Awesome-new-battlecruiser!!*

Craft are on the first comment, if you put any of them in the ad which I request you do, use the Military Spacecraft and Military Aircraft, and Tanks, if you do Military Spacecraft use the Nouvelle, Alpha Centauri Attack Carrier, Monument-Class Heavy Destroyer or Trophy-Class Heavy Destroyer, as the rest are out of service. Heres our flag: The ad can be as long as you like, but if you want to really have restrictions, about 15-20 seconds? How long can they be? Thanks!

- - - Updated - - -

That IMG link isn't working for some reason, heres a link to the pics page: http://i.imgur.com/D9Af7MS.png
Length can be as long or as short as you want them to be. Companies...i hadn't considered them when i created this, but i don't see why i can't make it work! Adding your company to the OP!

Ohh, I would be honored if you would like to do this:

Link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/131910-AMRSD-SpaceShipOne-White-Knight?p=2145260#post2145260

But if doesn't make a good movie, try this:

Link: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126916-AMRSD-Willys-MB-BM-8-8-82mm-rocket-launcher-variant-Jeep
You have been added to the OP lineup.

Would you help me sell my house? Pretty please?

Craft thread: Kolonial House

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/132982-FOR-SALE%21-Lovely-2-Bedroom-2-Storey-Kolonial-House-1-Min-Walk-to-KSC%21-19-036-neg-Unfurnished

I've heard there's an actual furniture mod with furniture and such. If so you could furnish the house and advertise is as fully furnished and jack up the price!

The house has been tested in outer space and landed on Dres by BlueCanary, too!
Ok, i'll see what i can do. Adding you to the wip list in op.
Ok, I'm back...um...having issues with using my movie maker. Anyone know of a free downloadable moviemaker I can use?

Ok, I'm back...um...having issues with using my movie maker. Anyone know of a free downloadable moviemaker I can use?

I use Windows movie maker
Yeah, i was trying to use movie maker and publish, but it fails to recognize me. Wants my microsoft code.

As strange as it sounds, there is an alternative to Movie Maker called Movie Maker 2.6, it's pretty much the Vista version of it with wider selection of post processing effects. Because it was made in the era of Vista, it should support HD output too.

http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34
Ok, i finally have a few,personal vids up on youtube. Need to make a few more tests before i,can get back on track with this. Thank you for your patience.
